penis.transformationDescription:
Letting out an involuntary moan, [npc.name] [npc.verb(feel)] [npc.her] penis beginning to transform, and [npc.sheIs] hit by a wave of overwhelming arousal as a strong but flexible material coats [npc.her] shaft.
[npc.She] now [npc.has] a [style.boldHyena(synthetic penis)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.penisFullDescription(true)].
[npc.She] [npc.has] [style.boldHyena([npc.ballsCount]#IF(npc.isInternalTesticles()) internal#ENDIF balls)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.ballsFullDescription(true)], which produce [npc.cumColour(true)] [style.boldHyena(synth-cum)].
